DOC.brief_title: A Phase2 Clinical Trial Trafermin Patients With Marginal Periodontitis Japan
DOC.criteria: The patient marginal periodontitis intend conduct flap operation ( modified Widman ) must meet following criterion : Alveolar bone defect diagnose radiography . Mobility teeth must < =2 width attach gingiva suitable GTR ( guide tissue regeneration ) method . Males female , > =20 year age . Patients exclude study follow condition present : Concomitant administration adrenal cortical steroid within 4weeks treatment trial . Current previous history gingival overgrowth drug . Current previous history cancer malignant tumour . Presence diabetes mellitus ( HbA1c > =6.5 % ) Presence malnutrition ( serum albumin < =2g/dL ) Pregnancy lactation
